title: WTT: My T205 Bates/Bell Sovereigns for your T206 Sovereigns
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Bates/Bell Sovereigns for your T206 Sovereigns
posts.post_content:
I've got a couple extra Sovereigns hanging around the dupes box, so was hoping to trade them for some T206 needs.  Let me know if you have anything to trade, and maybe we can work something out.  The scans aren't great, but the best my scanner does.  Maybe my phone will do better, if you're interested.

Cheers,
Geno
